= CORE_MovingActivities

//Include information from owl files

The following model provides an overview of :CORE_MovingActivities

image::./images/{diagram_x}.png[alternative text]

include::xx_yy_zz.adoc[]

|===
|Element |Description

|Type
|owl:Class

|Name
|CORE_MovingActivities

|IRI
|http://ontology.asam.net/ontologies/OpenXOntologyHQDM.owl#CORE_MovingActivities

|Subclass of
|:CORE_StateChangingActivities

|Comment
|Activities where the actor changes its position (location and/or orientation) during the activity.
Includes translational moving (change in location) and rotational/anchored moving (changes of position "in place")
Note: "dynamic activities" correspond to "translationally moving activities".
Note: "quasi static activities" may include "anchored moving activities" - need to check

|===
